name: Skater skateboard stickman
description:
This is free skateboard game! so stickman!

The farther in skateboard!

[Game Overview]

It is killing time game that the stick man advance more far to go in skateboard.

In pooled jumping while you touch the screen, jump by releasing!

Let the distance to compete with the aim of more distant!

If you get the best score,Let's share with Tweets and LINE, etc.

[Note]

· When Tweet, use the icon image of this application.so need access authority to the image file.
